name: Streadata.io API Gallery - Azure CDN
description: This is a repository of azure cdn APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: Azure CDN
apis.description: Ensuring a consistent user experience is important. If your websites or mobile apps involve streaming media, gaming software, firmware updates (Smart TVs, consumer electronic appliances) or IoT endpoints (cars, sensors), Content Delivery Network helps you reduce load times, save bandwidth, and increase responsiveness.
